mapper.select: select id, code, contract_code, contract_name, cust_code, start_time, end_time, term, total_money, status, type, memo, operate, manager_code, operator_code, operator_name, update_time, create_time from market.contractdetails_tmp where code = #{code}

select id, code, contract_code, contract_name, cust_code, start_time, end_time, term, total_money, status, type, memo, operate, manager_code, operator_code, operator_name, update_time, create_time from market.contractdetails_tmp limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into market.contractdetails_tmp(code, contract_code, contract_name, cust_code, start_time, end_time, term, total_money, status, type, memo, operate, manager_code, operator_code, operator_name, update_time, create_time) values (#{code}, #{contractCode}, #{contractName}, #{custCode}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{term}, #{totalMoney}, #{status}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{operate}, #{managerCode}, #{operatorCode}, #{operatorName}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime})

insert into market.contractdetails_tmp(code, contract_code, contract_name, cust_code, start_time, end_time, term, total_money, status, type, memo, operate, manager_code, operator_code, operator_name, update_time, create_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.contractCode}, #{entity.contractName}, #{entity.custCode}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.term}, #{entity.totalMoney}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.operate}, #{entity.managerCode}, #{entity.operatorCode}, #{entity.operatorName}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into market.contractdetails_tmp(code, contract_code, contract_name, cust_code, start_time, end_time, term, total_money, status, type, memo, operate, manager_code, operator_code, operator_name, update_time, create_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.contractCode}, #{entity.contractName}, #{entity.custCode}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.term}, #{entity.totalMoney}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.memo}, #{entity.operate}, #{entity.managerCode}, #{entity.operatorCode}, #{entity.operatorName}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update code = values(code) , contract_code = values(contract_code) , contract_name = values(contract_name) , cust_code = values(cust_code) , start_time = values(start_time) , end_time = values(end_time) , term = values(term) , total_money = values(total_money) , status = values(status) , type = values(type) , memo = values(memo) , operate = values(operate) , manager_code = values(manager_code) , operator_code = values(operator_code) , operator_name = values(operator_name) , update_time = values(update_time) , create_time = values(create_time)
mapper.update:
update market.contractdetails_tmp
code = #{code},
contract_code = #{contractCode},
contract_name = #{contractName},
cust_code = #{custCode},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
term = #{term},
total_money = #{totalMoney},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
memo = #{memo},
operate = #{operate},
manager_code = #{managerCode},
operator_code = #{operatorCode},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
where code = #{code}
